title: Avail now! free parking and easy access to public transport
posting_body: Conveniently Located off of Columbia Road and just a few minutes from Andrew Station (Red Line) and South Bay Center (Movie Theatre, Restaurants, Shopping, Groceries).
Located in a desirable Dorchester neighborhood with easy access to I-93.
This unit offers 4 large rooms which can all be used as bedrooms or use one of them as a living room or office for professionals working from home.
Kitchen has granite countertops, updated range and Microwave.
Hardwood floors across the entire apartment and touchpad control heating system.
Free parking on the side of the building!
